alert.note: Alert for Coastal Collier County; Inland Collier County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 20 at 11:39AM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Collier County through 1215 PM EDT... At 1139 AM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm near North Naples, or near Bonita Springs, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Golden Gate Estates, Naples Park, Orangetree, Big Corkscrew Island, North Naples, Vineyards, Corkscrew Swamp Sanctuary and Quail Creek Estate. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Collier County; Inland Collier County
